website_summaries.verdict: A single capsule aids in generating new testosterone.
pros: We love that this supplement includes ingredients approved by testing agencies of the NFL and NCAA
Expect improvements all around in regards to motivation
Customers love that you can feel results in just a few weeks
cons: Some may experience minor libido change

customer_reviews.title: A product that Delivers!
customer_reviews.text: At age 64 I need a non prescription remedy to increase my Testosterone levels. This product comes very close to prescription strength Androgel! I switched and my stamina has remained strong. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel E. Carcano

customer_reviews.title: DHEA may be an added plus
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product, I’ve tried various herbal male enhancers and most have been good. My body responds well to them but this is the first one I’ve taken with DHEA, it seems to be working well. Not much for weight loss but that’s more on me and my diet and alcohol consumption. I will say that it does help me get and maintain quality full potential erections. I’m on my 3rd bottle so far, I will keep taking it until Amazon flings a different product my way. I’m not partial to this particular product because as I said, I’ve had good results with all the others I’ve tried as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Simply stellar!!

The company Customer Service is SOLID: the owner reached out to me a few weeks later...in case I had questions 4. Price is equivalent to the stellar product . The takeaways: NO side effects, NO more mid afternoon Löw energy. Overall I feel more energized...it just works! Excellent product- 5 stars!!!

Looking at the ingredients I would say it is probably due to the DHEA and the higher levels of Fenugreek and Tribulus that this product has in it as compared to the other.

This one makes me feel great like another one that I took with fenugreek, but was more than twice the price! I will definitely buy this again.

Took approximately 7-10 days and then I felt the positive effects and I combine with ZMA and ashwanghanda, I now believe it’s as advertised, a quality product using a non-proprietary mix of ingredients proven to enhance the body’s natural ability to keep up free testosterone levels. Thank you for this product, you have a customer for life.

Wow, no side effects, great energy all day and I don’t feel those ups and down like many other products. I feel 20 years younger and my wife is liking what it does for me as well. Lol. customer_reviews.text: This product makes a noticeable difference in the way that I feel (in a good way). I'm over 30 and I feel like I am able to train at my full potential again. I also feel like I have more mental clarity now.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for workout recovery!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 45 and last summer I tried the test boost for aid in energy / recovery for my triathlon training. I was very impressed with the results I felt, especially on the recovery side of things. I took the winter off but started taking it in April again as I dive into Ironman training. I’m also very happy with their customer service as well, will definitely buy from again!

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this product too much. It more or less had me oscillating between spaced out and angry. This might not be the experience for most people, but that's how it worked out for me.
